title: Alyssa Lung
text:
Hi, I’m Alyssa, a senior at UCLA studying Statistics and Data Science with a minor in entrepreneurship. I’m passionate about the intersection between data science and thinking outside the box. I had the opportunity to intern at FTI consulting and will be returning September 2025 in the Data and Analytics field within the Forensic and Litigation segment. I currently work at a startup, helping the founders grow their platform and perform market research.
In my free time, I teach yoga, love to travel, and attend concerts!
If you want to learn more about me, check out my resume.

title: Alyssa Lung
text:
Experience
Ellevoy | Product Strategy and Market Research Intern | October 2023 - Present Research target market and strategize with founders to launch company.
UCLA Disabilities and Computing Program | Data Lead | September 2022 - Present Maintain and analyze online accessibility tools, analyzing return on investment and utilization rates across campus.
FTI Consulting | Data and Analytics Intern | June 20203 - August 2023 Utilized data science to work on forensic and litigation investigation cases.
